Reviews.Title: Better Than Average Camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Diehard
Reviews.Content: Purchased a couple of these cameras to replace some units that failed from a professional installation less than two years ago.  Used the lens that came with the original cameras and the picture quality is better than before.  Our application is outdoors and the cameras are mounted in heated enclosures.Make sure you select the right lens for the application, which is not included.  Also, this camera is not intended to be exposed to the elements outdoors and requires external power supply.

ProductInfo.Name: Toshiba IK-6550A Analog Camera, 540 TV Lines, 24V AC and 12V DC
